dish_menu.dish_desc: A hearty pasta dish consisting of al dente noodles,a meat sauce and meatballs.  The dish is extremely popular with kids and orginated from Italy.
A fiery and flavorful rice dish with pork, carrots, peas and green onions.  The dish has an oriental taste and orginated from China.
A dish where its difficulty depends on its complexity.  It makes use of fresh ingredients and is usually accompanied with soy sauce and wasabi for dipping.  The dish originated from Japan.
A exotic dish that goes well with rice, bread or noodles.  It is often spicy and cooked with chicken, beef or lamb.  The dish orginated from India.

A fun and light breakfast dish that is easy to make and popular with kids.  A variety of different kinds can be made by incorporating fruits, nuts or chocolate.  It is believed that this dish originated from Greece and Rome.
